response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and significance, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. Given its worth to both us and you, we believe it's only fair to extend this offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

This exceptional offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. We understand the importance of making such a decision and would like to assure you that our team stands ready to provide any additional information or support you might need to make an informed choice.

Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
